topic.title: APPOINTMENT SLOT SHORT NOTICE CANCELLATION INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the APPOINTMENT SLOT could be reallocated, where the ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND National Code is 'APPOINTMENTcancelled by, or on behalf of, thePATIENT', where the APPOINTMENT was cancelled at short notice.
